pages.text: In this world, death doesn't tend to stick. It's more of a minor annoyance, really. Having to retrieve all of your belongings every time you die. Perhaps one could keep hold of their items, even through death itself.
A Soulforged Lock allows one to do just that. By combining it with an item in a crafting grid, that item will bind itself to your very soul, and persist with you beyond the grave into your next body.
